files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Peterson, Holly 

numberOfBottles = int(input("How many starting bottles? "))

while (numberOfBottles <= 1): 
    
    print("You must enter 1 or more bottles. \n ")
    numberOfBottles = int(input("How many starting bottles? "))
    
for slurmBottles in range(numberOfBottles,0,-1):
    
    print(slurmBottles,"bottles of Slurm on the wall. \n ")
    print(slurmBottles,"bottles of Slurm..") 
    print("Take one down, pass it around..")
    print(slurmBottles - 1,"bottles of Slurm on the wall.")

print("No more bottles of Slurm on the wall! \n ")
